mapper.insert: insert into deliveryreceipt (deliveryReceliptID, startCity, endCity, midCity, makeDate, State, Comment) values (#{deliveryReceliptID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update deliveryreceipt set startCity = #{startCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endCity = #{endCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, midCity = #{midCity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, makeDate = #{makeDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, State = #{state,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where deliveryReceliptID = #{deliveryReceliptID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select deliveryReceliptID, startCity, endCity, midCity, makeDate, State, Comment from deliveryreceipt
